verses.verse: Now <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> toward the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> and <S%H3427>settled<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> and <S%H7793>Shur;<s%> then he <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in <S%H1642>Gerar.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> "She is my <S%H269>sister.<s%>" So <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> you are a <S%H4191>dead<s%> man <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H3947>taken,<s%> for she is <S%H1167>married.<s%> <S%H1166><s%>"

Now <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> had not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> her; and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord,<s%> wilt Thou <S%H2026>slay<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> [though] <S%H6662>blameless<s%>?

"Did he not <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to me, 'She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>'? And she <S%H1931>herself<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> 'He is my <S%H251>brother.<s%>' In the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and the <S%H5356>innocence<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%>"

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him in the <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H1571>"Yes,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that in the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> and I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2820>kept<s%> you from <S%H2398>sinning<s%> against Me; <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I did not <S%H5414>let<s%> you <S%H5060>touch<s%> her.

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H7725>restore<s%> the man's <S%H802>wife,<s%> for he is a <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and he will <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you, and you will <S%H2421>live.<s%> But <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H7725>restore<s%> [her,] <S%H3045>know<s%> that you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are yours."

So <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> in their <S%H241>hearing;<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>frightened.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> to us? And <S%H4100>how<s%> have I <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you, that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> on me and on my <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin<s%>? You have <S%H6213>done<s%> to me <S%H4639>things<s%> that ought not to be <S%H6213>done.<s%>"
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you <S%H7200>encountered,<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>?"

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> I <S%H559>thought,<s%> <S%H7534>surely<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> and they will <S%H2026>kill<s%> me <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of my <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H1571>"Besides,<s%> she <S%H546>actually<s%> is my <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my father, but not the <S%H1>daughter<s%> of my <S%H1323>mother,<s%> and she <S%H517>became<s%> my <S%H1961>wife;<s%>

and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> caused me to <S%H8582>wander<s%> from my father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> that I <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H2088>'This<s%> is the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you will <S%H6213>show<s%> to me: <S%H413>everywhere<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4725><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> we <S%H935>go,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of me, "He is my <S%H251>brother.<s%>"' "

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> then <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H8198><s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H7725>restored<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> to him.
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you; <S%H3427>settle<s%> wherever you <S%H2896>please.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>"

And to <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is your <S%H3682>vindication<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with you, and <S%H854>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>men<s%> you are <S%H3198>cleared.<s%>"

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his <S%H519>maids,<s%> so that they <S%H3205>bore<s%> [children.]

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6113>closed<s%> <S%H6113>fast<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7358>wombs<s%> of the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> Abraham's <S%H802>wife.<s%>
